name: tekno.Portal
short_description: tekno.Portal is "A dynamic content management system". System includes categorized article posting, news posting (headlines), download manager, links manager, newsletter, polls, comment writing to articles etc. Only Turkish language is supported now.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)
